title: About Kamunity
story:
# Our Story

Kamunity was born from the belief that every great community starts with a single spark of connection. We're building a platform where meaningful relationships flourish and positive change happens.

## What We Do

We bring people together through shared interests, values, and goals. Our platform combines the best of social networking with community-driven content and AI-powered insights.

timeline.title: Platform Launch
timeline.description: Kamunity launches with core community features

timeline.title: AI Integration
timeline.description: Advanced AI features for enhanced community experiences
